normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Gas Cylinder Prices – Ouch!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, wallet feeling a bit light lately? Guess what? Gas cylinder prices just went up again! Seems like our beloved kitchen companion is costing us more dough than ever.
normalised: Hey folks, wallet feeling a bit light lately? Guess what? Gas cylinder prices just went up again! Seems like our beloved kitchen companion is costing us more dough than ever.

unnormalised: Word on the street is a standard 14.2 kg cylinder will now set you back Rs. 1150 in Delhi. And don't even get me started on the commercial ones – those restaurant owners serving up our favorite biryani are feeling the pinch even more!
normalised: Word on the street is a standard fourteen point two kilogram cylinder will now set you back rupees one thousand one hundred and fifty in Delhi. And don't even get me started on the commercial ones – those restaurant owners serving up our favorite biryani are feeling the pinch even more!

unnormalised: This price hike comes right before Onam, the big Kerala festival, when families cook up a storm. Imagine the extra expense for all those delicious sadhya feasts!
normalised: This price hike comes right before Onam, the big Kerala festival, when families cook up a storm. Imagine the extra expense for all those delicious sadhya feasts!

unnormalised: Oil companies are saying it's due to global factors, but honestly, it feels like we're always getting a raw deal. Experts suggest looking into alternative energy sources, but that’s easier said than done, right? Maybe it's time to dust off the old chulha (just kidding... mostly!).
normalised: Oil companies are saying it's due to global factors, but honestly, it feels like we're always getting a raw deal. Experts suggest looking into alternative energy sources, but that’s easier said than done, right? Maybe it's time to dust off the old chulha (just kidding... mostly!).

unnormalised: Seriously though, at this rate, we'll be thinking twice before making that Sunday lamb curry. What's a foodie to do? The government should seriously consider some relief.
normalised: Seriously though, at this rate, we'll be thinking twice before making that Sunday lamb curry. What's a foodie to do? The government should seriously consider some relief.
